title: COLLECTIVE
summary: This is the current project I'm working on in my spare time for myself and a collection of creative friends and family members. It's a Node app running on Heroku and is very much a work in progress. My hope is to implement authentication and database interactions to allow upload of new material via the UI to promote a better UX for other members of the collective.

title: Neuromarketing Lesson
summary: Lesson plan about neuromarketing for advanced Tufts seminar.
